Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: To contribute to the vision, strategic and operational direction for the National College, working closely with the leadership group to help ensure that the organisation is fully able to meet its targets and strategic objectives. Overall responsibility for leading the development of a successful approach to licensing for the College underpinned by a set of core principles. To implement the approach such that the delivery of all National College licensed provision ensures consistent high quality Leadership Development provision for leaders in Schools and Childrens Centres. To be responsible for a number of College programmes which will either stop, or move into licensed provision between now and 2014. To manage the risks and ensure the smooth transition of such programmes, as well as the provision of new licensed programmes, into the market place.

Name: Margaret Farrar
Job/Team Function: To lead the direction of the Leadership Development directorate. Shares responsibility for the strategic direction and vision for the National College, working closely with the CEO and the SLT, to ensure that the organisation is fully able to meet its targets and strategic objectives. Leads on and ensures that the NC is seen as highly influential in policy development and delivery, delivers high quality research that makes a difference to leadership practice, secures the supply of leaders within the school system. Overall responsibility for designing, licensing and commissioning high quality leadership development provision for leaders at all levels, including NPQH. Responsible for developing leadership capability across schools and children's centre and the supply of Head Teachers with a focus on individuals within the system.
